channel.title: Deltascape cleaned most cleaned delta souce no anti leech
channel.description: Bugs fixed and some stuff - fixed anti-leech null glitch - syi, agf bot, and null protection - log-in death - all known dupes have been fixed (including logout dupe + fast decline) - Fixed random char reseting - multi-barrage fix in multiplayer-zones -Flooding fixed - fixed random char dieing upon login -established server to run days with out management client class size 409kb server load is minimum and yet max performance in game NO ANTI LEECHES IN THIS!! mostly removed all crap but left some commands ipban mute ban kick etc download http://uppit.com/v/XHDFITXF

item.title: Deltascape cleaned most cleaned delta souce no anti leech
item.dc:creator: @Lewis3 Lewis)
item.description:
@Lewis3 wrote:

[quote=“jamessemple, post:11, topic:289447”]Mate your a fucking tosser! :mad:
i run the server… it gets on ok and then the anti-flood bans your IP
Your a fucking dick and shouldnt have touched anything on the source that u didnt know wat u were doing… why cant someone just realease the exact same source without the anti-leech and just leave it like that -.-[/quote]

There ARE loads of downloads without anti-leach you fucking dumb ass , learn how to remove it yourself it isnt hard …

Read full topic

@Lin wrote:

If I didn’t already have all of this added and more, I’d download it. Nice job anyway.

item.title: Deltascape cleaned most cleaned delta souce no anti leech
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Bugs fixed and some stuff

  • fixed anti-leech null glitch
  • syi, agf bot, and null protection
  • log-in death
  • all known dupes have been fixed (including logout dupe + fast decline)
  • Fixed random char reseting
  • multi-barrage fix in multiplayer-zones
    -Flooding fixed
  • fixed random char dieing upon login
    -established server to run days with out management
    client class size 409kb server load is minimum and yet max performance in game
    NO ANTI LEECHES IN THIS!!
    mostly removed all crap but left some commands ipban mute ban kick etc
    download http://uppit.com/v/XHDFITXF

Read full topic
